pageProduct.name: Thankyou Botanical Cedarwood Body Wash 1L
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Made from ingredients grown from the earth like coconut extracts and aloe vera leaf juice, and naturally fragranced with plant oils like cedarwood, geranium, eucalyptus and mandarin, one wash with this beauty will leave you feeling zen, rehydrated and with skin so soft, you’ll feel like you just came out of an hour-long massage!

Fresh, foresty and rich, the Botanical Cedarwood fragrance will appeal to everyone from Adam to Zoe.  Snap it up now, we have a feeling this is going to be one of our most popular body washes yet.

And the best part? By choosing Thankyou, you help get clean water, hygiene solutions and toilets to people in need so you can do and smell good, all at the same time.

It’s also available in a 500mL option if that floats your boat.

To make you feel clean and revitalised we’ve put the good stuff into this plant-based body wash, like cedarwood and eucalyptus essential oils. We’re all about keeping it real, so we’ve also left out nasties like:

Sulphates (SLS/SLES)
EDTA
Propylene glycol
Parabens
Harsh petrochemicals
Triethanolamine
Synthetic fragrances
Harsh detergents
Animal derivatives
Mineral oils
Artificial colours
PEGs

Made with love in Australia. Not tested on animals and vegan friendly.

Warnings

We recommend patch testing before use. Store below 30°C. For external use only. Massage over skin to create a lather. Avoid contact with eyes (if you get some in there, rinse immediately with water).

If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue. To help us make our products the best they can be, we’d love to hear your feedback.

Common Uses

Showers, baths

Ingredients

Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine (coconut- derived), Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate (coconut- derived), Decyl Glucoside (coconut derived), Aloe Vera Leaf Juice (organic), Green Tea Extract, Basil Oil, Chamomile Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Gluconate, Cedarwood oil, eucalyptus oil, Fragrance (Natural), Citric Acid. 

Directions

Massage over your skin to create a lather, then work over your body. Rinse off, wrap yourself in a towel to dry, and you’re ready for the day ahead.
